screensaver.name: apple2
screensaver._description:
Simulates an original Apple ][ Plus computer in all its 1979 glory. It also reproduces the appearance of display on a color television set of the period.
In "Text Mode", it displays the output of a command (e.g., "fortune".)
In "Slideshow Mode", it chooses a number of images from the image source you configured into XScreenSaver and displays them within the limitations of the Apple ][ display hardware. (Six available colors in hi-res mode!)
In "Basic Programming Mode", a simulated user types in a BASIC program and runs it.
By Trevor Blackwell.
